message: Let's start fair.  I'm happy to take a slightly larger share, but let's see how this goes.
Your share decreases faster than mine, Alice.  Let's be reasonable.
I'm willing to compromise, but let's split the difference from your last offer.  This is the last time I'll make an offer before the inflation kicks in further.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and avoid losing even more to inflation.
